title: Three inexperienced film makers get lost in a haunted woods.
review: Don't believe the HYPE.  This gets very long and you just hope they'd get killed already.  How many times can three people scream the same lines over and over again?  You'll see.

title: A haunted little boy seeks help from a psychologist.
review: Holy Ghost! is this a great film!  I saw it two days ago and I still am pondering it.  Bruce Willis has never been so good and that little boy is wonderfully sincere.  Go see this movie right away.
